list_definition.definition: (usually with at, for) to point or direct something at; to try to hit or reach etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He picked up the rifle and aimed it at the target.

list_definition.definition: (with to, at) to plan, intend or to have as one’s purpose

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We aim to please our customers.

list_definition.definition: the act of or skill at aiming
what a person intends to do

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His aim is to become a doctor.
